Cedratus.text: Funeral takes place and trust you will come on the ---

Celeber.text: Send me a lock of his (or her) hair

Celsus.text: Will cannot be found, can you give any information

Cenchris.text: Has made a Will which is now in the custody of

Cepetum.text: Decline to accept, except on terms proposed

Cephalus.text: Decline to accept, except on terms already mentioned

Cepphus.text: Decline to accept on any conditions

Cepurica.text: Decline to accept on terms mentioned

Cerastes.text: Decline to accept under any circumstances circumstances

Cerno.text: Delay departure until you receive my letter

Ceroma.text: Delay departure until you hear again

Cervix.text: Is any delay likely to occur
